amendment.description: An amendment numbered 104 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce the salary of Miguel Cardona, Secretary of Education, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 260, 1 Present (Roll no. 665).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 260, 1 Present (Roll no. 665).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
